thread.title: David Soll Honored With Multiple IEEE Awards
thread.title_full: David Soll Honored With Multiple IEEE Awards - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: David Soll Honored With Multiple IEEE Awards
text:
Omicron president David Soll is recognized by IEEE for advancing technology for humanity. Soll has played a major role in bringing technology experts together for key conferences.
Cherry Hill, New Jersey (PRWEB) October 01, 2015
David Soll, President and Chief Technology Officer of Omicron, a leading IT integrator, OSIsoft PI and Microsoft technology partner, is the recipient of multiple awards from IEEE, the world’s largest association for the advancement of technology, for his leadership and guidance of the organization.
“In the fast-paced, rapidly changing world of IT infrastructure, it’s crucial for organizations like IEEE to foster collaboration among IT and technology professionals in order to drive technological innovations and excellence for the benefit of humanity,” says Soll. “I’m honored to be recognized for my role in helping bring colleagues together to stay ahead of the latest technology and help improve IT systems like OSIsoft PI.”
In the early 2000’s, many technology conferences were cancelled due to budget cuts. Recognizing the benefit of bringing his colleagues together, Soll launched the IEEE/ACM Information Technology Professional Conference in 2006. He’s served as the chair since then, helping to grow the cost-effective event that brings technology and IT professionals together.
“Under David Soll’s leadership, the conference has gained a strong reputation for providing timely technical and professional content to attendees from as far away as Africa and Japan,” says Habib Ahson, chair of the Princeton/Central Jersey section of the IEEE. “We’re grateful for David’s contributions to the IT field as he continues to innovate at Omicron and within the industry.”
Soll has received multiple awards from IEEE and has spoken at several conferences, including the Association for Computer Machinery (ACM), International Society of Automation (ISA) and Microsoft seminars. He currently serves as vice-chair of the Princeton/Central NJ Chapter of IEEE.
Omicron has a history of melding visionary ideas with state-of-the-art technology to create practical and successful business applications. Companies make significant financial investments in open infrastructure to mine data and enable real-time intelligence. Omicron ensures that all of a business’ software systems are properly communicating, maximizing the value of the OSIsoft PI System purchase.
###
About Omicron
Omicron Development LLC is devoted to maximizing the value and effectiveness of clients’ OSIsoft PI and Microsoft SharePoint software investments. As a leading IT integrator, Omicron excels at connecting OSIsoft PI Systems with a company’s existing IT infrastructure. Founded by President and CTO David Soll, Omicron has more than 25 years of experience working with medium and large enterprises to design, develop and implement the best custom IT solutions for businesses. They fill the gaps between the customer’s needs and a company’s off-the-shelf solution capabilities.
About IEEE
IEEE's core purpose is to foster technological innovation and excellence for the benefit of humanity. IEEE will be essential to the global technical community and to technical professionals everywhere, and be universally recognized for the contributions of technology and of technical professionals in improving global conditions
